verses.first_half_tle: Thine eyes did see my substance, yet being imperfect;
verses.second_half_tle: and in thy book were all my members written;

verses.first_half: Which day by day were fashioned,
verses.second_half: when as yet there was none of them.
verses.first_half_tle: Which day by day were fashioned,
verses.second_half_tle: when as yet there was none of them.

verses.first_half: How dear to me are your thoughts, O God.
verses.second_half: How great is the sum of them!
verses.first_half_tle: How dear are thy counsels unto me, O God;
verses.second_half_tle: O how great is the sum of them!

verses.first_half: If I were to count them, they would be more in number than the sand.
verses.second_half: When I wake up, I am present with you.
verses.first_half_tle: If I tell them, they are more in number than the sand:
verses.second_half_tle: when I wake up, I am present with thee.

verses.first_half: Oh, that you would slay the wicked, O God!
verses.second_half: Depart from me, you bloodthirsty men.
verses.first_half_tle: Wilt thou not slay the wicked, O God?
verses.second_half_tle: Depart from me, ye bloodthirsty men.

verses.first_half: For they speak unrighteously against you;
verses.second_half: your enemies take your Name in vain.
verses.first_half_tle: For they speak unrighteously against thee;
verses.second_half_tle: and thine enemies take thy Name in vain.

verses.first_half: Do I not hate those, O LORD, who hate you,
verses.second_half: and do I not loathe those who rise up against you?
verses.first_half_tle: Do not I hate them, O LORD, that hate thee?
verses.second_half_tle: and am not I grieved with those that rise up against thee?

verses.first_half: Indeed, I hate them with a perfect hatred;
verses.second_half: they have become my own enemies.
verses.first_half_tle: Yea, I hate them right sore;
verses.second_half_tle: even as though they were mine enemies.

verses.first_half: Search me, O God, and know my heart;
verses.second_half: try me and examine my thoughts.
verses.first_half_tle: Try me, O God, and seek the ground of my heart;
verses.second_half_tle: prove me, and examine my thoughts.

verses.first_half: Look well if there be any way of wickedness in me,
verses.second_half: and lead me in the way everlasting.
verses.first_half_tle: Look well if there be any way of wickedness in me;
verses.second_half_tle: and lead me in the way everlasting.

verses.first_half: Deliver me, O LORD, from evildoers,
verses.second_half: and preserve me from the violent,
verses.first_half_tle: Deliver me, O LORD, from the evil man;
verses.second_half_tle: and preserve me from the wicked man;

verses.first_half: Who imagine evil in their hearts
verses.second_half: and stir up strife all the day long.
verses.first_half_tle: Who imagine mischief in their hearts,
verses.second_half_tle: and stir up strife all the day long.

verses.first_half: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent;
verses.second_half: adders’ poison is under their lips.
verses.first_half_tle: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent;
verses.second_half_tle: adder’s poison is under their lips.

verses.first_half: Keep me, O LORD, from the hands of the ungodly;
verses.second_half: preserve me from the violent, who have purposed to overthrow my steps.
verses.first_half_tle: Keep me, O LORD, from the hands of the ungodly;
verses.second_half_tle: preserve me from the wicked men, who are purposed to overthrow my goings.

verses.first_half: The proud have laid a snare for me and spread out a net with cords;
verses.second_half: they have set traps in my way.
verses.first_half_tle: The proud have laid a snare for me, and spread a net abroad with cords;
verses.second_half_tle: yea, and set traps in my way.

verses.first_half: I said unto the LORD, “You are my God;
verses.second_half: hear the voice of my prayers, O LORD.”
verses.first_half_tle: I said unto the LORD, Thou art my God,
verses.second_half_tle: hear the voice of my prayers, O LORD.

verses.first_half: O LORD God, the strength of my salvation,
verses.second_half: you have covered my head in the day of battle.
verses.first_half_tle: O LORD God, thou strength of my health;
verses.second_half_tle: thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.

verses.first_half: Let not the ungodly have their desire, O LORD;
verses.second_half: let not their evil imagination prosper, lest they be too proud.
verses.first_half_tle: Let not the ungodly have his desire, O LORD;
verses.second_half_tle: let not his mischievous imagination prosper, lest they be too proud.

verses.first_half: Let not those who encompass me lift up their heads;
verses.second_half: let the evil of their own lips consume them.
verses.first_half_tle: Let the mischief of their own lips fall upon the head of them
verses.second_half_tle: that compass me about.

verses.first_half: Let hot burning coals fall upon them;
verses.second_half: let them be cast into the fire and into the pit, that they may never rise up again.
verses.first_half_tle: Let hot burning coals fall upon them;
verses.second_half_tle: let them be cast into the fire, and into the pit, that they never rise up again.

verses.first_half: A slanderer shall not prosper upon the earth;
verses.second_half: evil shall hunt the wicked person to overthrow him.
verses.first_half_tle: A man full of words shall not prosper upon the earth:
verses.second_half_tle: evil shall hunt the wicked person to overthrow him.

verses.first_half: I am sure that the LORD will avenge the poor
verses.second_half: and maintain the cause of the helpless.
verses.first_half_tle: Sure I am that the LORD will avenge the poor,
verses.second_half_tle: and maintain the cause of the helpless.

verses.first_half: Surely, the righteous shall give thanks unto your Name,
verses.second_half: and the just shall continue in your sight.
verses.first_half_tle: The righteous also shall give thanks unto thy Name;
verses.second_half_tle: and the just shall continue in thy sight.

verses.first_half: LORD, I call upon you; hasten unto me,
verses.second_half: and hear my voice when I cry unto you.
verses.first_half_tle: LORD, I call upon thee; haste thee unto me,
verses.second_half_tle: and consider my voice, when I cry unto thee.

verses.first_half: Let my prayer be set forth in your sight as incense,
verses.second_half: and let the lifting up of my hands be an evening sacrifice.
verses.first_half_tle: Let my prayer be set forth in thy sight as the incense;
verses.second_half_tle: and let the lifting up of my hands be an evening sacrifice.

verses.first_half: Set a watch, O LORD, before my mouth,
verses.second_half: and keep the door of my lips.
verses.first_half_tle: Set a watch, O LORD, before my mouth,
verses.second_half_tle: and keep the door of my lips.

verses.first_half: O let not my heart be inclined to any evil thing;
verses.second_half: let me not be occupied in ungodly works with those who work wickedness, lest I eat of such things as please them.
verses.first_half_tle: O let not mine heart be inclined to any evil thing;
verses.second_half_tle: let me not be occupied in ungodly works with the men that work wickedness, neither let me eat of such things as please them.

verses.first_half: Rather, let the righteous smite me,
verses.second_half: and in their loving-kindness reprove me.
verses.first_half_tle: Let the righteous rather smite me friendly, and reprove me;
verses.second_half_tle: yea, let not my head refuse their precious balms.

verses.first_half: But let not the oil of the unrighteous anoint my head;
verses.second_half: while I live, I will pray against their wickedness.
verses.first_half_tle: As for the ungodly,
verses.second_half_tle: I will pray yet against their wickedness.

verses.first_half: Let their rulers be overthrown in stony places,
verses.second_half: that they may hear my words, for they are sweet.
verses.first_half_tle: Let their judges be overthrown in stony places,
verses.second_half_tle: that they may hear my words; for they are sweet.

verses.first_half: Let their bones lie scattered at the mouth of the grave,
verses.second_half: as when the ploughman scatters the earth in furrows.
verses.first_half_tle: Our bones lie scattered before the pit,
verses.second_half_tle: like as when one breaketh and heweth wood upon the earth.

verses.first_half: But my eyes look unto you, O LORD God;
verses.second_half: in you is my refuge; O do not cast out my soul.
verses.first_half_tle: But mine eyes look unto thee, O LORD God;
verses.second_half_tle: in thee is my trust; O cast not out my soul.

verses.first_half: Keep me from the snare which they have laid for me,
verses.second_half: and from the traps of the evildoers.
verses.first_half_tle: Keep me from the snare that they have laid for me,
verses.second_half_tle: and from the traps of the wicked doers.

verses.first_half: Let the ungodly fall into their own nets together,
verses.second_half: and let me ever escape them.
verses.first_half_tle: Let the ungodly fall into their own nets together,
verses.second_half_tle: and let me ever escape them.

verses.first_half: I cried unto the LORD with my voice;
verses.second_half: even unto the LORD I made my supplication.
verses.first_half_tle: I cried unto the LORD with my voice;
verses.second_half_tle: yea, even unto the LORD did I make my supplication.

verses.first_half: I poured out my complaints before him,
verses.second_half: and showed him my trouble.
verses.first_half_tle: I poured out my complaints before him,
verses.second_half_tle: and showed him of my trouble.

verses.first_half: When my spirit was in heaviness, you knew my path;
verses.second_half: in the way wherein I walked they had secretly laid a snare for me.
verses.first_half_tle: When my spirit was in heaviness, thou knewest my path;
verses.second_half_tle: in the way wherein I walked, have they privily laid a snare for me.

verses.first_half: I looked also to my right hand
verses.second_half: and saw there was no one who would know me.
verses.first_half_tle: I looked also upon my right hand,
verses.second_half_tle: and saw there was no man that would know me.

verses.first_half: I had no place to flee to,
verses.second_half: and no one cared for my soul.
verses.first_half_tle: I had no place to flee unto,
verses.second_half_tle: and no man cared for my soul.

verses.first_half: I cried out to you, O LORD, and said,
verses.second_half: “You are my refuge, and my portion in the land of the living.”
verses.first_half_tle: I cried unto thee, O LORD, and said,
verses.second_half_tle: Thou art my hope, and my portion in the land of the living.

verses.first_half: Consider my complaint,
verses.second_half: for I am brought very low.
verses.first_half_tle: Consider my complaint;
verses.second_half_tle: for I am brought very low.

verses.first_half: O deliver me from my persecutors,
verses.second_half: for they are too strong for me.
verses.first_half_tle: O deliver me from my persecutors;
verses.second_half_tle: for they are too strong for me.

verses.first_half: Bring me out of prison, that I may give thanks unto your Name.
verses.second_half: When you show me your loving-kindness, then shall the righteous gather around me.
verses.first_half_tle: Bring my soul out of prison, that I may give thanks unto thy Name;
verses.second_half_tle: which thing if thou wilt grant me, then shall the righteous resort unto my company.

verses.first_half: Hear my prayer, O LORD, and consider my supplications;
verses.second_half: hearken to me, for your truth and righteousness’ sake.
verses.first_half_tle: Hear my prayer, O LORD, and consider my desire;
verses.second_half_tle: hearken unto me for thy truth and righteousness’ sake.

verses.first_half: Enter not into judgment with your servant,
verses.second_half: for in your sight shall no one living be justified.
verses.first_half_tle: And enter not into judgment with thy servant;
verses.second_half_tle: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.

verses.first_half: For the enemy has persecuted my soul; he has smitten my life down to the ground;
verses.second_half: he has laid me in the darkness, like those who have been long dead.
verses.first_half_tle: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; he hath smitten my life down to the ground;
verses.second_half_tle: he hath laid me in the darkness, as the men that have been long dead.

verses.first_half: Therefore my spirit faints within me,
verses.second_half: and my heart within me is desolate.
verses.first_half_tle: Therefore is my spirit vexed within me,
verses.second_half_tle: and my heart within me is desolate.

verses.first_half: Yet I remember the time past; I muse upon all your works;
verses.second_half: indeed, I meditate on the works of your hands.
verses.first_half_tle: Yet do I remember the time past; I muse upon all thy works;
verses.second_half_tle: yea, I exercise myself in the works of thy hands.

verses.first_half: I stretch forth my hands to you;
verses.second_half: my soul gasps for you as a thirsty land.
verses.first_half_tle: I stretch forth my hands unto thee;
verses.second_half_tle: my soul gaspeth unto thee as a thirsty land.

verses.first_half: Hear me, O LORD, and very soon, for my spirit grows faint;
verses.second_half: hide not your face from me, lest I be like those who go down into the pit.
verses.first_half_tle: Hear me, O LORD, and that soon; for my spirit waxeth faint:
verses.second_half_tle: hide not thy face from me, lest I be like unto them that go down into the pit.

verses.first_half: O let me hear your loving-kindness in the morning, for in you have I put my trust;
verses.second_half: show me the way that I should walk in, for I lift up my soul unto you.
verses.first_half_tle: O let me hear thy loving-kindness betimes in the morning; for in thee is my trust:
verses.second_half_tle: show thou me the way that I should walk in; for I lift up my soul unto thee.

verses.first_half: Deliver me, O LORD, from my enemies,
verses.second_half: for I flee unto you to hide me.
verses.first_half_tle: Deliver me, O LORD, from mine enemies;
verses.second_half_tle: for I flee unto thee to hide me.

verses.first_half: Teach me to do the thing that pleases you, for you are my God;
verses.second_half: let your loving Spirit lead me forth into the land of righteousness.
verses.first_half_tle: Teach me to do the thing that pleaseth thee; for thou art my God:
verses.second_half_tle: let thy loving Spirit lead me forth into the land of righteousness.

verses.first_half: Revive me, O LORD, for your Name’s sake;
verses.second_half: and for your righteousness’ sake bring my soul out of trouble.
verses.first_half_tle: Quicken me, O LORD, for thy Name’s sake;
verses.second_half_tle: and for thy righteousness’ sake bring my soul out of trouble.

verses.first_half: Of your goodness slay my enemies,
verses.second_half: and destroy all those who afflict my soul, for I am your servant.
verses.first_half_tle: And of thy goodness slay mine enemies,
verses.second_half_tle: and destroy all them that vex my soul; for I am thy servant.

verses.first_half: Blessed be the LORD my strength,
verses.second_half: who teaches my hands to war and my fingers to fight,
verses.first_half_tle: Blessed be the LORD my strength,
verses.second_half_tle: who teacheth my hands to war and my fingers to fight:

verses.first_half: My hope and my fortress, my stronghold and deliverer, my defender in whom I trust,
verses.second_half: who subdues the peoples under me.
verses.first_half_tle: My hope and my fortress, my castle and deliverer, my defender in whom I trust;
verses.second_half_tle: who subdueth my people that is under me.

verses.first_half: O LORD, what is man, that you have shown such respect to him,
verses.second_half: or the son of man, that you so regard him?
verses.first_half_tle: LORD, what is man, that thou hast such respect unto him?
verses.second_half_tle: or the son of man, that thou so regardest him?

verses.first_half: Man is like a thing of nought;
verses.second_half: his time passes away like a shadow.
verses.first_half_tle: Man is like a thing of nought;
verses.second_half_tle: his time passeth away like a shadow.

verses.first_half: Bow your heavens, O LORD, and come down;
verses.second_half: touch the mountains, and they shall smoke.
verses.first_half_tle: Bow thy heavens, O LORD, and come down;
verses.second_half_tle: touch the mountains, and they shall smoke.

verses.first_half: Cast forth your lightning and scatter them;
verses.second_half: shoot out your arrows and consume them.
verses.first_half_tle: Cast forth thy lightning and tear them;
verses.second_half_tle: shoot out thine arrows, and consume them.

verses.first_half: Send down your hand from above;
verses.second_half: deliver me, and take me out of the great waters, from the hand of strangers,
verses.first_half_tle: Send down thine hand from above;
verses.second_half_tle: deliver me, and take me out of the great waters, from the hand of strangers;

verses.first_half: Whose mouth talks of vain things,
verses.second_half: and whose right hand is a right hand of falsehood.
verses.first_half_tle: Whose mouth talketh of vanity,
verses.second_half_tle: and their right hand is a right hand of wickedness.

verses.first_half: I will sing a new song unto you, O God,
verses.second_half: and sing praises unto you upon a ten-stringed lute.
verses.first_half_tle: I will sing a new song unto thee, O God;
verses.second_half_tle: and sing praises unto thee upon a ten-stringed lute.

verses.first_half: You have given victory to kings,
verses.second_half: and have delivered David your servant from the peril of the sword.
verses.first_half_tle: Thou hast given victory unto kings,
verses.second_half_tle: and hast delivered David thy servant from the peril of the sword.

verses.first_half: Save me, and deliver me from the hand of strangers,
verses.second_half: whose mouth talks of vain things, and whose right hand is a right hand of falsehood;
verses.first_half_tle: Save me, and deliver me from the hand of strangers,
verses.second_half_tle: whose mouth talketh of vanity, and their right hand is a right hand of iniquity:

verses.first_half: That our sons may grow up as young plants,
verses.second_half: and that our daughters may be as the polished corners of the temple,
verses.first_half_tle: That our sons may grow up as the young plants,
verses.second_half_tle: and that our daughters may be as the polished corners of the temple;

verses.first_half: That our storehouses may be full and plenteous with all manner of grain,
verses.second_half: that our sheep may bring forth thousands and ten thousands in our fields,
verses.first_half_tle: That our garners may be full and plenteous with all manner of store;
verses.second_half_tle: that our sheep may bring forth thousands, and ten thousands in our fields;

verses.first_half: That our oxen may be strong to labor, that there be no decay,
verses.second_half: no leading into captivity, and no outcry in our streets.
verses.first_half_tle: That our oxen may be strong to labor; that there be no decay,
verses.second_half_tle: no leading into captivity, and no complaining in our streets.

verses.first_half: Happy are the people of whom this is so;
verses.second_half: indeed, blessed are the people who have the LORD for their God.
verses.first_half_tle: Happy are the people that are in such a case,
verses.second_half_tle: yea, blessed are the people who have the LORD for their God.

verses.first_half: I will magnify you, O God my King,
verses.second_half: and I will praise your Name for ever and ever.
verses.first_half_tle: I will magnify thee, O God my King;
verses.second_half_tle: and I will praise thy Name for ever and ever.

verses.first_half: Every day will I give thanks to you,
verses.second_half: and praise your Name for ever and ever.
verses.first_half_tle: Every day will I give thanks unto thee;
verses.second_half_tle: and praise thy Name for ever and ever.

verses.first_half: Great is the LORD, and most worthy to be praised;
verses.second_half: there is no end of his greatness.
verses.first_half_tle: Great is the LORD, and marvelous worthy to be praised;
verses.second_half_tle: there is no end of his greatness.

verses.first_half: One generation shall praise your works to another,
verses.second_half: and shall declare your power.
verses.first_half_tle: One generation shall praise thy works unto another,
verses.second_half_tle: and declare thy power.

verses.first_half: As for me, I will be talking of the glorious splendor of your majesty,
verses.second_half: and of all your wondrous works.
verses.first_half_tle: As for me, I will be talking of thy worship,
verses.second_half_tle: thy glory, thy praise, and wondrous works;

verses.first_half: They shall speak of the might of your marvelous acts,
verses.second_half: and I also will tell of your greatness.
verses.first_half_tle: So that men shall speak of the might of thy marvelous acts;
verses.second_half_tle: and I will also tell of thy greatness.

verses.first_half: The remembrance of your abundant goodness shall they proclaim,
verses.second_half: and they shall sing of your righteousness.
verses.first_half_tle: The memorial of thine abundant kindness shall be showed,
verses.second_half_tle: and men shall sing of thy righteousness.

verses.first_half: The LORD is gracious and merciful,
verses.second_half: long-suffering, and of great kindness.
verses.first_half_tle: The LORD is gracious and merciful;
verses.second_half_tle: long-suffering, and of great goodness.

verses.first_half: The LORD is loving to everyone,
verses.second_half: and his mercy is over all his works.
verses.first_half_tle: The LORD is loving unto every man;
verses.second_half_tle: and his mercy is over all his works.

verses.first_half: All your works praise you, O LORD,
verses.second_half: and your faithful servants give thanks to you.
verses.first_half_tle: All thy works praise thee, O LORD;
verses.second_half_tle: and thy saints give thanks unto thee.

verses.first_half: They speak of the glory of your kingdom
verses.second_half: and talk of your power,
verses.first_half_tle: They show the glory of thy kingdom,
verses.second_half_tle: and talk of thy power,

verses.first_half: That your power may be known to the children of men,
verses.second_half: even the glorious splendor of your kingdom.
verses.first_half_tle: That thy power, thy glory, and mightiness of thy kingdom,
verses.second_half_tle: might be known unto men.

verses.first_half: Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom,
verses.second_half: and your dominion endures throughout all ages.
verses.first_half_tle: Thy kingdom is an everlasting kingdom,
verses.second_half_tle: and thy dominion endureth throughout all ages.

verses.first_half: The LORD upholds all those who fall
verses.second_half: and lifts up all those who are bowed down.
verses.first_half_tle: The LORD upholdeth all such as fall,
verses.second_half_tle: and lifteth up all those that are down.

verses.first_half: The eyes of all wait upon you, O Lord,
verses.second_half: and you give them their food in due season.
verses.first_half_tle: The eyes of all wait upon thee, O Lord;
verses.second_half_tle: and thou givest them their meat in due season.

verses.first_half: You open wide your hand,
verses.second_half: and fill all things living with plenteousness.
verses.first_half_tle: Thou openest thine hand,
verses.second_half_tle: and fillest all things living with plenteousness.

verses.first_half: The LORD is righteous in all his ways
verses.second_half: and merciful in all his works.
verses.first_half_tle: The LORD is righteous in all his ways,
verses.second_half_tle: and holy in all his works.

verses.first_half: The LORD is near to all those who call upon him,
verses.second_half: to all who call upon him faithfully.
verses.first_half_tle: The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him;
verses.second_half_tle: yea, all such as call upon him faithfully.

verses.first_half: He will fulfill the desire of those who fear him;
verses.second_half: he also will hear their cry and will help them.
verses.first_half_tle: He will fulfill the desire of them that fear him;
verses.second_half_tle: he also will hear their cry, and will help them.

verses.first_half: The LORD preserves all those who love him,
verses.second_half: but he will destroy all the ungodly.
verses.first_half_tle: The LORD preserveth all them that love him;
verses.second_half_tle: but scattereth abroad all the ungodly.

verses.first_half: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD;
verses.second_half: and let all flesh give thanks unto his holy Name for ever and ever.
verses.first_half_tle: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD;
verses.second_half_tle: and let all flesh give thanks unto his holy Name for ever and ever.

verses.first_half: Praise the LORD, O my soul;
verses.second_half: while I live I will praise the LORD.
verses.first_half_tle: Praise the LORD, O my soul: while I live, will I praise the LORD;
verses.second_half_tle: yea, as long as I have any being, I will sing praises unto my God.

verses.first_half: Indeed, as long as I have my being,
verses.second_half: I will sing praises unto my God.
verses.first_half_tle: O put not your trust in princes, nor in any child of man;
verses.second_half_tle: for there is no help in them.

verses.first_half: Put not your trust in princes, nor in any child of man,
verses.second_half: for there is no help in them.
verses.first_half_tle: For when the breath of man goeth forth, he shall turn again to his earth,
verses.second_half_tle: and then all his thoughts perish.

verses.first_half: For when one breathes his last, he shall return again to the earth,
verses.second_half: and in that day all his thoughts perish.
verses.first_half_tle: Blessed is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help,
verses.second_half_tle: and whose hope is in the LORD his God:

verses.first_half: Blessed is the one who has the God of Jacob for his help
verses.second_half: and whose hope is in the LORD his God,
verses.first_half_tle: Who made heaven and earth, the sea, and all that therein is;
verses.second_half_tle: who keepeth his promise for ever;

verses.first_half: Who made heaven and earth, the sea, and all that is therein;
verses.second_half: who keeps his promise for ever;
verses.first_half_tle: Who helpeth them to right that suffer wrong;
verses.second_half_tle: who feedeth the hungry.

verses.first_half: Who does right to those who suffer wrong;
verses.second_half: and who feeds the hungry.
verses.first_half_tle: The LORD looseth men out of prison;
verses.second_half_tle: the LORD giveth sight to the blind.

verses.first_half: The LORD sets prisoners free;
verses.second_half: the LORD gives sight to the blind.
verses.first_half_tle: The LORD helpeth them that are fallen;
verses.second_half_tle: the LORD careth for the righteous.

verses.first_half: The LORD helps those who have fallen;
verses.second_half: the LORD loves the righteous.
verses.first_half_tle: The LORD careth for the strangers; he defendeth the fatherless and widow:
verses.second_half_tle: as for the way of the ungodly, he turneth it upside down.

verses.first_half: The LORD cares for the strangers in the land; he defends the fatherless and widow;
verses.second_half: but the way of the ungodly he makes crooked.
verses.first_half_tle: The LORD thy God, O Zion, shall be King for evermore,
verses.second_half_tle: and throughout all generations.

verses.first_half: The LORD shall be King for evermore,
verses.second_half: even your God, O Zion, throughout all generations. Praise the LORD.

verses.first_half: Praise the LORD, for it is a good thing to sing praises unto our God;
verses.second_half: indeed, a joyful and pleasant thing it is to be thankful.
verses.first_half_tle: O praise the LORD, for it is a good thing to sing praises unto our God;
verses.second_half_tle: yea, a joyful and pleasant thing it is to be thankful.

verses.first_half: The LORD builds up Jerusalem,
verses.second_half: and gathers together the outcasts of Israel.
verses.first_half_tle: The LORD doth build up Jerusalem,
verses.second_half_tle: and gather together the outcasts of Israel.

verses.first_half: He heals those who are broken in heart,
verses.second_half: and binds up their wounds.
verses.first_half_tle: He healeth those that are broken in heart,
verses.second_half_tle: and giveth medicine to heal their sickness.

verses.first_half: He counts the number of the stars,
verses.second_half: and calls them all by their names.
verses.first_half_tle: He telleth the number of the stars,
verses.second_half_tle: and calleth them all by their names.

verses.first_half: Great is our Lord, and great is his power;
verses.second_half: indeed, his wisdom is infinite.
verses.first_half_tle: Great is our Lord, and great is his power;
verses.second_half_tle: yea, and his wisdom is infinite.

verses.first_half: The LORD lifts up the meek,
verses.second_half: and brings the ungodly down to the ground.
verses.first_half_tle: The LORD setteth up the meek,
verses.second_half_tle: and bringeth the ungodly down to the ground.

verses.first_half: O sing unto the LORD with thanksgiving;
verses.second_half: sing praises with the harp unto our God,
verses.first_half_tle: O sing unto the LORD with thanksgiving;
verses.second_half_tle: sing praises upon the harp unto our God:

verses.first_half: Who covers the heavens with clouds, and prepares rain for the earth,
verses.second_half: and makes the grass to grow upon the mountains, and plants for the use of men,
verses.first_half_tle: Who covereth the heaven with clouds, and prepareth rain for the earth;
verses.second_half_tle: and maketh the grass to grow upon the mountains, and herb for the use of men;

verses.first_half: Who gives food to the cattle
verses.second_half: and feeds the young ravens that call upon him.
verses.first_half_tle: Who giveth fodder unto the cattle,
verses.second_half_tle: and feedeth the young ravens that call upon him.

verses.first_half: He has no pleasure in the strength of a horse;
verses.second_half: neither does he delight in any man’s strength.
verses.first_half_tle: He hath no pleasure in the strength of an horse;
verses.second_half_tle: neither delighteth he in any man’s legs.

verses.first_half: But the LORD’s delight is in those who fear him
verses.second_half: and put their trust in his mercy.
verses.first_half_tle: But the LORD’s delight is in them that fear him,
verses.second_half_tle: and put their trust in his mercy.

verses.first_half: Praise the LORD, O Jerusalem;
verses.second_half: praise your God, O Zion.
verses.first_half_tle: Praise the LORD, O Jerusalem;
verses.second_half_tle: praise thy God, O Zion.

verses.first_half: For he has made strong the bars of your gates
verses.second_half: and has blessed your children within you.
verses.first_half_tle: For he hath made fast the bars of thy gates,
verses.second_half_tle: and hath blessed thy children within thee.

verses.first_half: He makes peace in your borders
verses.second_half: and fills you with the finest of wheat.
verses.first_half_tle: He maketh peace in thy borders,
verses.second_half_tle: and filleth thee with the flour of wheat.

verses.first_half: He sends forth his commandment upon the earth,
verses.second_half: and his word runs very swiftly.
verses.first_half_tle: He sendeth forth his commandment upon earth,
verses.second_half_tle: and his word runneth very swiftly.

verses.first_half: He gives snow like wool
verses.second_half: and scatters the white frost like ashes.
verses.first_half_tle: He giveth snow like wool,
verses.second_half_tle: and scattereth the hoarfrost like ashes.

verses.first_half: He casts forth his ice like crumbs;
verses.second_half: who is able to abide his frost?
verses.first_half_tle: He casteth forth his ice like morsels:
verses.second_half_tle: who is able to abide his frost?

verses.first_half: He sends out his word and melts them;
verses.second_half: he blows with his wind, and the waters flow.
verses.first_half_tle: He sendeth out his word, and melteth them:
verses.second_half_tle: he bloweth with his wind, and the waters flow.

verses.first_half: He declares his word unto Jacob,
verses.second_half: his statutes and ordinances unto Israel.
verses.first_half_tle: He showeth his word unto Jacob,
verses.second_half_tle: his statutes and ordinances unto Israel.

verses.first_half: He has not dealt so with other nations;
verses.second_half: neither have they knowledge of his laws. Praise the LORD.
verses.first_half_tle: He hath not dealt so with any nation;
verses.second_half_tle: neither have the heathen knowledge of his laws.

verses.first_half: Praise the LORD. O praise the LORD of heaven;
verses.second_half: praise him in the heights.
verses.first_half_tle: O praise the LORD from the heavens:
verses.second_half_tle: praise him in the heights.

verses.first_half: Praise him, all you angels of his;
verses.second_half: praise him, all his host.
verses.first_half_tle: Praise him, all ye angels of his:
verses.second_half_tle: praise him, all his host.

verses.first_half: Praise him, sun and moon;
verses.second_half: praise him, all you stars of light.
verses.first_half_tle: Praise him, sun and moon:
verses.second_half_tle: praise him, all ye stars and light.

verses.first_half: Praise him, all you highest heavens,
verses.second_half: and you waters that are above the heavens.
verses.first_half_tle: Praise him, all ye heavens,
verses.second_half_tle: and ye waters that are above the heavens.

verses.first_half: Let them praise the Name of the LORD,
verses.second_half: for he spoke the word, and they were made; he commanded, and they were created.
verses.first_half_tle: Let them praise the Name of the LORD:
verses.second_half_tle: for he spake the word, and they were made; he commanded, and they were created.

verses.first_half: He has made them stand fast for ever and ever;
verses.second_half: he has given them a law which shall not be broken.
verses.first_half_tle: He hath made them fast for ever and ever:
verses.second_half_tle: he hath given them a law which shall not be broken.

verses.first_half: Praise the LORD upon earth,
verses.second_half: you sea monsters and all deeps;
verses.first_half_tle: Praise the LORD from the earth,
verses.second_half_tle: ye dragons and all deeps;

verses.first_half: Fire and hail, snow and fog,
verses.second_half: wind and storm, fulfilling his word;
verses.first_half_tle: Fire and hail, snow and vapors,
verses.second_half_tle: wind and storm, fulfilling his word;

verses.first_half: Mountains and all hills,
verses.second_half: fruitful trees and all cedars;
verses.first_half_tle: Mountains and all hills;
verses.second_half_tle: fruitful trees and all cedars;

verses.first_half: Beasts and all cattle,
verses.second_half: creeping things and birds of the air;
verses.first_half_tle: Beasts and all cattle;
verses.second_half_tle: creeping things and flying fowls;

verses.first_half: Kings of the earth and all peoples,
verses.second_half: princes and all rulers of the world;
verses.first_half_tle: Kings of the earth and all peoples;
verses.second_half_tle: princes, and all judges of the world;

verses.first_half: Young men and maidens,
verses.second_half: old men and children together.
verses.first_half_tle: Young men and maidens, old men and children, praise the Name of the LORD:
verses.second_half_tle: for his Name only is excellent, and his praise above heaven and earth.

verses.first_half: Let them praise the Name of the LORD,
verses.second_half: for his Name only is excellent, and his praise above heaven and earth.
verses.first_half_tle: He shall exalt the horn of his people: all his saints shall praise him;
verses.second_half_tle: even the children of Israel, even the people that serveth him.

verses.first_half: He shall exalt the horn of his people; all his faithful shall praise him,
verses.second_half: the children of Israel, the people who are near him. Praise the LORD.

verses.first_half: Praise the LORD. O sing unto the LORD a new song;
verses.second_half: let the congregation of the faithful praise him.
verses.first_half_tle: O sing unto the LORD a new song;
verses.second_half_tle: let the congregation of saints praise him.

verses.first_half: Let Israel rejoice in the one who made him,
verses.second_half: and let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.
verses.first_half_tle: Let Israel rejoice in him that made him,
verses.second_half_tle: and let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.

verses.first_half: Let them praise his Name in the dance;
verses.second_half: let them sing praises unto him with timbrel and harp.
verses.first_half_tle: Let them praise his Name in the dance:
verses.second_half_tle: let them sing praises unto him with tabret and harp.

verses.first_half: For the LORD has pleasure in his people
verses.second_half: and gives victory to those who are oppressed.
verses.first_half_tle: For the LORD hath pleasure in his people,
verses.second_half_tle: and helpeth the meek-hearted.

verses.first_half: Let the faithful be joyful with glory;
verses.second_half: let them rejoice upon their beds.
verses.first_half_tle: Let the saints be joyful with glory;
verses.second_half_tle: let them rejoice in their beds.

verses.first_half: Let the praises of God be in their mouth
verses.second_half: and a two-edged sword in their hands,
verses.first_half_tle: Let the praises of God be in their mouth;
verses.second_half_tle: and a two-edged sword in their hands;

verses.first_half: To inflict vengeance on the nations,
verses.second_half: and to rebuke the peoples,
verses.first_half_tle: To be avenged of the nations,
verses.second_half_tle: and to rebuke the peoples;

verses.first_half: To bind their kings in chains,
verses.second_half: and their nobles with links of iron,
verses.first_half_tle: To bind their kings in chains,
verses.second_half_tle: and their nobles with links of iron;

verses.first_half: That they may execute judgment upon them, as it is written;
verses.second_half: this is the honor of all his servants. Praise the LORD.
verses.first_half_tle: To execute judgment upon them; as it is written,
verses.second_half_tle: Such honor have all his saints.

verses.first_half: Praise the LORD. Praise God in his holiness;
verses.second_half: praise him in the firmament of his power.
verses.first_half_tle: O praise God in his sanctuary:
verses.second_half_tle: praise him in the firmament of his power.

verses.first_half: Praise him for his mighty acts;
verses.second_half: praise him for his excellent greatness.
verses.first_half_tle: Praise him in his noble acts:
verses.second_half_tle: praise him according to his excellent greatness.

verses.first_half: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet;
verses.second_half: praise him upon the lute and harp.
verses.first_half_tle: Praise him in the sound of the trumpet:
verses.second_half_tle: praise him upon the lute and harp.

verses.first_half: Praise him with the timbrels and dances;
verses.second_half: praise him upon the strings and pipe.
verses.first_half_tle: Praise him in the timbrels and dances:
verses.second_half_tle: praise him upon the strings and pipe.

verses.first_half: Praise him with the resounding cymbals;
verses.second_half: praise him with the loud cymbals.
verses.first_half_tle: Praise him upon the well-tuned cymbals:
verses.second_half_tle: praise him upon the loud cymbals.

verses.first_half: Let everything that has breath praise the LORD.
verses.second_half: O praise the LORD.
verses.first_half_tle: Let everything that hath breath
verses.second_half_tle: praise the LORD.
